title: DunkMaster Garen Skins concept
body:
This skin need to be  real! DunkMaster Darius was a huge success but it need an opposing team to play in basketball and who is the biggest rival to darius? Garen of course ! This skin would be neat as 1350 or 1850 skin line for Garen ! We need our favorite Demacian to scream on the field ! FOR DEMACIA!!!
{{sticker:garen-swing}}

replies.body: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=59fz2cuvXG4

> [{quoted}](name=RageTHD,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-02-15T09:14:20.873+0000)
>
> https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=59fz2cuvXG4

Hahah nice to know it's a fan made skin, wish it would become a real one with amazing animation like Darius.
RIP custom skins btw :/

> [{quoted}](name=RageTHD,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2018-02-15T21:41:19.869+0000)
>
> RIP custom skins btw :/

You can't have custom skin anymore ?
With every update Riot changes files for champions that noone can edit them.

> [{quoted}](name=RageTHD,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-16T13:27:49.026+0000)
>
> With every update Riot changes files for champions that noone can edit them.

Oh lame :/
Demas??? lol

> [{quoted}](name=Bruh im ok,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-15T03:31:02.049+0000)
>
> Demas??? lol

im not the creator so.. and this is an ideas, not actual finished skins lol
ik
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=DeJoker,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2018-02-20T13:29:04.889+0000)
>
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Thanks good sir !
I really want Riot to approve this skin and finnally create the DunkMaster skin line !
Bump
This need more views !

> [{quoted}](name=ReportDotcom,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-02-15T15:32:29.626+0000)
>
> Illaoi, Okay, but Zoe Ori Ziggs and Ahri? No.

doesnt have to be a "dunkmaster" there are more positions in basketball (dunking is not a position anyways) but i  figure they can all have basketball themed skins because they have balls in their kits

> [{quoted}](name=Hells bellsX,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-02-15T18:05:26.988+0000)
>
> doesnt have to be a "dunkmaster" there are more positions in basketball (dunking is not a position anyways) but i  figure they can all have basketball themed skins because they have balls in their kits

Okay you make a point but personally, Ahri and Ori doesn't deserve skin for now.

this is fucking legendary (literally). its missing the ball dribbling animation though. and his ult should also be a giant dunk where he slams the basketball on his target.

this needs an interaction with the darius skin, where when theyre in the same game, only one of them has the ball in his hands at all times. decided by who of the two has the most amount of kills total, or who got the most recent kill.

> [{quoted}](name=Critmaster Garen,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-02-15T10:01:14.619+0000)
>
> this is fucking legendary (literally). its missing the ball dribbling animation though. and his ult should also be a giant dunk where he slams the basketball on his target.
> 
> this needs an interaction with the darius skin, where when theyre in the same game, only one of them has the ball in his hands at all times. decided by who of the two has the most amount of kills total, or who got the most recent kill.

That's fucking cool as fuck.

But i heard Lux is getting a new skin line with Ahri and Ezreal :')

> [{quoted}](name=silver 5 btw,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-02-15T13:58:00.173+0000)
>
> That's fucking cool as fuck.
> 
> But i heard Lux is getting a new skin line with Ahri and Ezreal :')

Sad but true xD{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

> [{quoted}](name=Critmaster Garen,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-02-15T10:01:14.619+0000)
>
> this is fucking legendary (literally). its missing the ball dribbling animation though. and his ult should also be a giant dunk where he slams the basketball on his target.
> 
> this needs an interaction with the darius skin, where when theyre in the same game, only one of them has the ball in his hands at all times. decided by who of the two has the most amount of kills total, or who got the most recent kill.

This! This would be the greatest interaction between the two of them !
This a pretty cool{{sticker:poppy-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=NappyTelevision,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-02-15T04:49:56.996+0000)
>
> This a pretty cool{{sticker:poppy-wink}}

Thanks ! I wish this would be true !
@Riot Please, add your comment !
DEMACIAAA!!!!{{sticker:garen-swing}}
I would love this Dunkmaster saying to Lux "Sorry Lux, momma said you were adopted."

> [{quoted}](name=Maldini30,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=06sG1JVu,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-02-16T13:33:43.918+0000)
